attributes.action: SAVE OUR WW1 -  WADHURST WORLD WAR ONE COMMEMORATION HALL FROM BEING DEMOLISHED.
attributes.additional_details: a Hall & Field Committee today has run rough shod over the Community, in an idea to demolish the Commemoration Hall to build a Health Centre, car park and Community Centre and Housing in it's place on also adjoining land to the Commemoration Hall. Doing away with a Community football pitch, cricket ground and bowls club.
attributes.background: WW1 - WADHURST COMMEMORATION HALL FACES DEMOLITION BY The Building Of Health Centre,Car Park & Housing,& new Community Centre. WW1 Commemoration Hall built by public donation in commemoration of those soldiers that died on fields of France & Belgium in WW1, on land given to the WADHURST Community.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
